fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, Environment, Single market, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Forest reproductive material, rural development, plant health regulations and plant protection products
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Advisory Group on the Food Chain and Animal and Plant Health#E00860#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=860#Not a member#C#Working Group on Plant Health#Working Group on Seeds and Propagating Material
goals__remit:
The Association is constituted from the professional forest nursery associations or other properly constituted bodies representing the forest nursery and seed trades  of member states of the European Union. 
 
The role of the Association is to represent and to defend the interests of the private producers of forest seed and plants and of all other activities relevant to the profession and to attempt to mediate between member states when disputes arise.  The Association shall be responsible particularly for giving the official views of the private seed and nursery sector on all matters concerning Forest Reproductive Material to the Commission of the European Union.
